data.text:
On WNYC, I heard about a contest to win tickets for Robert Lepage's The Andersen Project at the Kimmel Center in Philadelphia for next Saturday. As you know from reading my many posts here, I think Lepage is one of the most brilliant artists working in live performance today. So, I entered the contest, but figuring (like most contests) that I wouldn't win, and I bought tickets. And then, I won!

So now I have two tickets for sale (at my cost, of course-face price+Ripoffmaster service fees). If you want them, please contact me using the contact me link on the right side of this page.

I really know nothing about this show, but given Lepage's involvement I wanted to see it. He has yet to dissapoint me.

Update

on 2009-06-14 23:29 by controlgeek

Writeup on the show here.
